content: पलित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Weighing or containing so many {%palas%}.

पलित {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Grey, hoary, grey-haired, old, aged; तातस्य मे पलितमौलिनिरस्तकाशे (शिरसि) <ls>Ve. 3. 19.</ls> --तं {@--1@} Grey hair, or the greyness of hair brought on by old age; कैकेयीशंकयेवाह पलितच्छद्मना जरा <ls>R. 12. 2</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Much or ornamented hair. {@--3@} A tuft of hair (केशपाश). {@--4@} Mud, mire. {@--5@} Heat. {@--6@} Benzoin.
